price: Ní ti òdodo, dájúdájú àwọn gan-an ni ẹni òfò jùlọ ní Ọjọ́ Ìkẹ́yìn.
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡأَخۡسَرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: lā jarama annahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-akhsarūna
